content.detailedDescription:
Based on the top of a hill, our garden overlooks wind turbines & farm land.  we were outside looking at the stars and noticed a very unusual sight - looking east, 7 pulsating and moving bright lights were effectively hovering/dancing in the sky.  we stayed and observed for 20 minutes.  the lights did not look like stars (we can say this confidently, they were much finer/no haze) - although at times were as bright as stars, as they pulsated individually in a random sequence. the 'group' of lights kept a loose formation, but pulsated and moved rapidly together, back and forth, up and down and around in circles (but again, stayed in a loose shape) the colour seemed to changed slightly too (red/white).  at  one point a plane passed beneath them (to give a reference to height) which didn't effect the formation of lights or the movement.  
we have never felt the need to report anything like this before, i hope we have done so through the correct channels.
it would be appreciated if anyone could comment on ideas? we are a 'little un-nerved' putting it mildly!
thanks, jennifer
content.summary: Keeping a loose formation; 5-7 bright lights pulsing and moving around each other

content.detailedDescription: My mother felt compelled to step onto one of our back porches to look at the night sky, because her and her husband witnessed objects in the southwestern sky from our house a year ago. she yelled for me to come and look, and in the southwestern sky, i saw two objects hovering. they never got too close to each other, but i noticed that they did not move like airplanes would. at first, i thought it may have been two military craft approaching each other and sending back and forth communication because this happened right after obama went over congress's head to promote airstrikes in the middle east. i felt as though the two incidences were related. but the way these objects moved was unlike any aircraft i've seen. when one would move to the left, the other would then move to the left.. but not right away. it was as if they were challenging each other, or so i was thinking at the time. i pulled out my iphone to try to snap photos/videos, but the objects were far away and my 8megapixel camera just didn't have the power to capture anything substantial. i was amazed at how the objects were able to zip upwards, then downwards, and from side to side... they were glowing red, and when i looked at them through binoculars, they seemed to be rotating many lights around them. the objects were not like "flying saucers" and yet they seemed to be rotating like you would imagine one to, with the multi colored lights being at the bottom of each vessel. after about half an hour of watching them, my mom and i noticed an airplane coming up towards the one on the right hand side. we both had a pretty bad feeling, because we'd realized at that point that these objects that were defying the laws of physics could not be man made. the airplane got closer to the object on the right hand side, and the object appeared to emit something red out of it, almost laser like, but with no sound, and suddenly the airplane was gone out of sight. it was as if it had disappeared, but then, very far south of us, my mom and i noticed what appeared to be lightning coming up from out of the ground, lighting up the entire south end of the sky (but not lighting up as high as the clouds.) there was no sound, no rolling thunder that we would normally hear, but we saw these lights flash multiple times as the evening progressed, and then less and less after about an hour of the airplane disappearing. we thought that was peculiar, but weren't about to get in our car and check anything out. the green swamp is what is south of us - lots of places for people to get lost (this is central florida.) and no, we did not see swamp gas. my 12 year old nephew was still awake because he knew my mom and i weren't stepping from the porch and had our eyes fixated on something we were witnessing. at first he would not come out to see what we saw, because he is very much a skeptic and makes fun of shows like ufo hunters and ancient aliens. but we did convince him to come outside, and he saw what we saw - two objects hovering along with each other, but never too close to each other, always keeping a safe distance, but clearly having some sort of communication with each other, and moving in ways that no normal flying object could move. i don't care how crazy it sounds, but i know that a human being was not operating those vessels, as they would not be able to handle the g force. we also noticed that before one of the objects would move, it appeared to glow more brilliantly red, as if it were building up power to change position, and a little bit of a some kind of red colored emission would come out of the opposite end of whatever way the object moved. i gathered this to be some kind of propulsion system. we stayed outside to watch these objects for hours, thinking we'd see them whisk off into the sky at some point, or just disappear altogether (they did sometimes blink out of existence for a moment and appear at another somewhat close location, and it was like they did this instead of the red glowing thing sometimes to move - as if they chose which method they would use for their quick change of location.) we decided to scan around the rest of the sky and see if we noticed anything else peculiar, as we'd also witnessed 7 "shooting stars" in total throughout the evening - we assume due to the solar flares that were going on. the shooting stars ended up being in the news a few days later, but i saw one that was so bright that i questioned how something could end up that close to the earth without leaving an impact. that was the first one of the shooting stars that i witnessed, also in the south sky. (seems to be something about the southern sky where i live.) as we looked around the rest of the sky, my mom noticed a star like object in the sky to the southwest. she said it was very close at first, and then moved further away. i didn't see it until it moved further away. she felt as if it sensed her seeing it and that that's why it moved away. from where i was, with the naked eye, it looked like a really bright star. but when i looked with binoculars, i could see that it had a very different shape indeed. i don't really know how to explain it, except that it was sort of star like, but with a much longer bottom end. almost like an 8 pointed star. although it shined bright white from the naked eye, through the binoculars, i could see a distinct pattern that stretched from the center to each "arm" of the object. that distinct pattern reminded me of veins, as they seemed to go back and forth between being red and blue. now, i am not saying that they pulsated in color. i don't know how to explain it. i am not color blind, but it was as if they could have been either color depending on how you looked at them. it was very odd. this object also moved like the others moved, although it was clearly moving further and further away from us, going in the southeast direction. i was beginning to become very used to these objects after seeing them for hours without them exiting the sky - i thought it almost to be a warning. not to us regular people hanging out in the world living our lives, but to the government. i felt strongly that it was a warning to the government to stop the airstrikes and warmongering going on, something that could be easily covered up by "oh, it was just solar flares acting up and shooting stars because of a meteor shower." odd that i did not hear about this meteor shower beforehand, but i'll try to stifle my own contemplation and stick to the facts. i realized i'd only been paying attention to the southern portion of the sky so i looked to my  left a little more, which made me face directly east. low and behold, there was another object, identical to the one i was just looking at: a star like object. everything about it was the same as the object i had just seen, so i didn't pay too much more attention to it, just that it also jolted back and forth and sideways sometimes, and seemed to be moving in the same direction as what i think of as it's counterpart. at that point, both things i saw were in sets of two, however, they were two different types of craft one hundred percent. i decided at that point to look directly above me to see if there was anything unusual in that part of the sky, and, as suspected, there was. this object was not trying to get further away or any closer, but seemed to be, for the most part, stationary in place. it did, however, sometimes jilt itself around like the others, for some unknown reason. when i looked at it through the binoculars and finally got them adjusted so that i could get a clear look, it was as if i'd just stepped into an episode of one of those tv shows my nephew makes so much fun of. it was clearly triangular in shape, with an orangish colored glowing body, but with a red nose (the nose being the part that i would imagine is the front pointy part.) by this point, all objects were visible in the sky at once, but in very different sections of the sky. i don't think they were related to each other, but may have all had a similar agenda. i really have no idea. they did not seem to care that the others were also inhabiting the airspace, and after seeing that first airplane that disappeared after trying to contact the first set of ufos, i did not see another airplane all night long. i thought that was odd, considering that the orlando airport often sends planes over our house, as well as another smaller regional airport. my mom and i stayed up all night to watch these things, as i'd never seen anything like it before (she has before) and we were certain we'd get to watch them whisk off quickly into the sky and disappear that way, but i never did. they moved slowly as they faded off into the sky and disappeared as it became daylight outside. by that point, i was too tired to continue watching and went into my house to sleep.
content.summary: Two objects reacting with each other in the south/southwest skies, sometimes zigzagging in nature - then more objects noticed in the southern sky of different color/type.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived at my apartment.  my car had been acting up that night and drove 120 miles home.  about 15 miles from home my alternator really started messing up.  i doubt it had anything to do with the sighting but i thought i'd throw that in.  i had just opened my door and was speaking to my boyfriend when the object caught my eye.  i pointed it out to him and he saw as well.  
i was looking toward my boyfriend while i was sitting in my car and just happened to notice movement in the sky.  i thought it was geese for a second until i really took a look at it.  
it was in a very uniform and very smooth glide.  it made no sound.  it was fairly low in the sky.  
i really just said "what the $#@* is that?!"  i was very stumped and kept looking for it after it disappeared as it passed the buildings.  
i had my camera on me but i noticed it too late.  i didn't want to take my eyes off of it.
content.summary: Dark tranagular shape with a slight extension at the tips like wings.  textured looking underside.  no lights, no sounds.  smooth glide.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 5 pm when i left my house to make a call and see facing the sky over a tree a bright, well-defined object, such as a cigarette, to into detail, confirm it was not a plane or a helicopter, much least one balloon. immediately i began to record video but could not see on the phone screen. switch to photo mode and take two shots in a row, then take another short video and almost did not see the object. look in my eyes is accelerating much and try to make another video but it was gone.
i observed the object for a few seconds, about 16 seconds, but enough to detail its shape and intensity, also note that was oval and elongated in the center of the object turned something black. before he disappeared i could see changed course and speed up incredibly fast. immediately from my house and download photos and videos to see how it looked on a larger screen. i showed it to my wife and friends and all were surprised.
wait long response from several organizations in my country which i had asked them to send photos and videos, but i never responded. so i decided to contact mufon and tell what i saw.

spanish:

anaco, 03 de diciembre del 2013. hora: 5:00 pm.

eran las 5 de la tarde cuando salí de mi casa a hacer una llamada y mire de frente al cielo sobre un árbol un objeto brillante pero bien definido, como un cigarro, al detallarlo más, confirme que no era un avión ni un helicóptero, mucho menos un globo. inmediatamente comencé a grabar video pero no lo lograba ver en la pantalla del celular. cambie a modo foto y saque 2 fotos seguidas, luego tome otro corto video y ya casi no se veía el objeto. mire con mis ojos como está acelerando mucho y trate de grabar otro video pero ya se había ido.
pude observar el objeto por pocos segundos, alrededor de 16 seg, pero lo suficiente para detallar su forma e intensidad de brillo, también note que tenía forma ovalada y alargada y en el centro del objeto giraba algo negro. antes de desaparecer pude ver como cambiaba de rumbo hacia arriba y acelero increíblemente rápido. inmediatamente entre a mi casa y descargue las fotos y los videos para ver cómo se veía en una pantalla más grande. se lo mostré a mi esposa y amigos y todos se sorprendieron mucho.
espere por mucho tiempo respuesta de varias organizaciones de mi país a las cuales les había pedido enviar las fotos y videos, pero no me respondieron nunca. por eso decidí en contactar a mufon y contarles lo que vi.
content.summary: It was brilliant, oval , it was moving fast and quietly. had a flash . direcion change and accelerated until lost

content.detailedDescription: I have a picture of what appears to be a black star just sitting in the sky in daylight i didnt know it was there until the next day when i looked at my photos so to the naked eye it was cloaked and i can prove it i been watching the news and no one has reported seeing a black looking star in the sky in daylight and i am not the only witness to this my cousin and his son were outside with me when i took that picture and none of us seen that and the picture i took was by accident i had my windows tablet out so i could video the storm
content.summary: I took a picture of a black looking star that i couldnt see with my naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
There have been multiple and ongoing sightings of the triangles and occasional orb sightings.  these sightings began in late august 2014 and have been seen by multiple people in the jackson and ross county area.  usually at night but my mother in law had a day time orb sighting. since the sightings happen almost every night and are on going i believe it is a flap like event.  if you hurry you may be able to have a first hand sighting and make your own record.  in all likely hood we will probably see them again tonight, and indeed it seems in the nights to come.  however i don't know how long the craft will continue to appear with this apparent level of regularity.  we have 2 video's of the craft good quality digital. we look forward to sharing our sighting with you.  also there have been other  previous sightings in the area of a different and profound nature.  the previous sighting seemed to include a type of conflict because two years ago me and my fiancé saw a craft explode in the sky after many blinking white lights crossed from east to west late at night.  
 i cant send video at this time because i don't know how and it is at my fiancés mother but we can retrieve easely. [phone# moved/cms/rjl]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangles and orange orbs working together touching at one point

content.detailedDescription: Estaba colocandome y bebiendo( alcohol) cuando un humanoide mi quito el porro y se lo fumó, despues me llevaron a la nave con una vaca-perro y un perro-cerdo. me violaron, me dieron salmón, me volvieron a violar y me sondaron me obligaron a participar como piñata en un afiesta infantil alienigena cagando cargarmerlo y pepsi-cola. vino chuck norris me dió una patada giratoria que me hiso ver ha dios y cagar mas pepsi cola.
content.summary: Me sondaron.Y estoy cagando pepsi-cola

content.detailedDescription: A month ago on a sunday morning, i woke up and walk to the back of my house to get some fresh air and enjoy the mountain view. when i was there, i took few pictures of the mountains and when i look back at those pictures i found something unusual. i found 2 objects which i was not able to see with my naked eyes. i’m posting the picture here for your own imagination and views.
content.summary: A month ago on a sunday morning, i woke up and walk to the back of my house to get some fresh air and enjoy the mountain view. when i was there, i took few pictures of the mountains and when i look back at those pictures i found something unusual. i fo

content.detailedDescription:
In honokaa hawaii at about 2:30 am, september 22, 2014 i was laying in bed getting ready to sleep. i can see straight out my window the way my bed is positioned, so i just glanced down not even purposely looking out of the window and a flashing light caught my eye!
immediately i thought i was a plane but the colors were very bright! just flashing white, then red, then green, and sometimes a reddish orange,  it just stood out in a different way then normal plane lights do. so i just laid there watching it for a bit, after a couple mins of it not moving. i called my boyfriend and we both went to the window, we stood there watching it for almost 20 mins! it did not move! only hovering in a back and forth, up and down motion. it was defiantly not a plane!
as we were watching i noticed another one doing the exact same thing about 100-200 feet to the left of the first one. which really started to freak me out!.
after two hours it still did not move! only now it would sometimes turn white and stay that way for a min or two at a time then start flashing colors again. 
this just happened about 20 mins before i am writing this and i have no idea if it is still there or not i am totally scared to even fall asleep right now! or even go to the window to check it out.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing red, green lights in the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
Flicked snake in woods
snake was buried, with a shrine
pictures of alien snakes
felling weird
more photos or wired shapes in the sky
eke seeing the shapes
parents agree
friend acts weird on phone , acts like he is being watched, not laughing like he should be
pick up the camp
slow red car truck in front won't let us pass
dark feeling
felt like we were going in circles
and felt being trapped in the woods
finally got to the end
no service wrong direction
almost turned around and got hit but geoff knew beforehand
got on right direction still no service
random fog
sisters phone call going out when we start talking bout pics
creepy slow car , kept breaking
then got around him , another creepy rode
took photo of backseat
still no service
prayed for service and came back then it acted like it got taken away
random fog again
bad ear popping unusual
signs look like snake
coyote howling earlier
 voice is going out
weird voicemail from dad
keep high beaming the lights
forgetting fo turn them off
weird vibe is slowing going away as we get further away from the mountain
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unexplainable, felt uncomfortable, snake like object flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription: This will be my second report. i have been observing these objects this month and also during the month of august. i hope this report will be taken more seriously. these objects can be seen most nights. unless it is stormy or too cloudy. using 7 x35mm wide angle 9.5 degree binoculars to look at these objects. on this night they moved lower and close enough that i was able to photograph them with my cell phone. they made no noise. they hover for long periods of time moving in an pendulum, zigzag, anda sort of figure 8 pattern. then they will move closer or further away.Periodically in the manner i mentioned above.They also emmit balls of light. they are ejected at very fast speed. these object at times then emit a flash of light simular to a flash grenade.  there is a farm across the street. if the orbs are ejected over the farm the cows sound like they are screaming. these craft also change their attitude. one night there were at least15 - 20  of them in a circle several miles in diameter. and they were all flashing their lights like a strobe light on the 6th of september at about 3:30am i sat up in bed to close the window. and there was a round obe across the street above the neighbors back yard. it dropped straight down from several hdred feet to behind the trees i think it landed somewhere behind the neighbors in the woods or a field. it decended so quickly i didnt have time to photograph it. and to tell the truth it kinda rattled me a bitto see it that close there have been several reports of ufos in the tri-state area. several of them being in ohio. one in salem ohio just this week. and there was an incident in pa that was seen by not only rhe wittness. but several police as well.The objects are hard to describe. i think i will let the photos speak for themselves .
content.summary: One was flame colored. the other was white blue and green. both changed shapes. at times both objects seemed to seperate into more than one object.

content.detailedDescription: This will be my second report. i have been observing these objects this month and also during the month of august. i hope this report will be taken more seriously. these objects can be seen most nights. unless it is stormy or too cloudy. using 7 x35mm wide angle 9.5 degree binoculars to look at these objects. on this night they moved lower and close enough that i was able to photograph them with my cell phone. they made no noise. they hover for long periods of time moving in an pendulum, zigzag, anda sort of figure 8 pattern. then they will move closer or further away.Periodically in the manner i mentioned above.They also emmit balls of light. they are ejected at very fast speed. these object at times then emit a flash of light simular to a flash grenade.  there is a farm across the street. if the orbs are ejected over the farm the cows sound like they are screaming. these craft also change their attitude. one night there were at least15 - 20  of them in a circle several miles in diameter. and they were all flashing their lights like a strobe light on the 6th of september at about 3:30am i sat up in bed to close the window. and there was a round obe across the street above the neighbors back yard. it dropped straight down from several hdred feet to behind the trees i think it landed somewhere behind the neighbors in the woods or a field. it decended so quickly i didnt have time to photograph it. and to tell the truth it kinda rattled me a bitto see it that close there have been several reports of ufos in the tri-state area. several of them being in ohio. one in salem ohio just this week. and there was an incident in pa that was seen by not only rhe wittness. but several police as well.The objects are hard to describe. i think i will let the photos speak for themselves .

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work. it was 8pm when i saw some lights in the sky.I was on airport road which runs north and south i was heading south. i was not sure which way the object was heading. after driving a short distance we finally met. (at first i thought the object was an airplane.) so the object was heading north. what got my attention was the object was diamond shaped (to the best of my knowledge)and had a blinking light on each diamond point. it looked like it had a light on shining out of the front directly in the center of the object. it was flying low about 3 times the height of the trees and slow as it was in my view for a few minutes even though i was heading in the opposite direction.As i got to my exit one mile further south i turned right (west) to head home and as i turned the corner the object crossed the side road right in front of me (around 300 yards)it seemed to be a the same altitude. still flying low and slow. i stopped the car and turn it off. then got out to see if i could hear any thing. there was no sound. this is what has me wondering what it is. i have seen lots of air craft but they have all made some sounds. this was dead silent. i continued to the next concession and followed it down the next turn in the road for me. i lost sight of it as it proceed south over the ski hill. by the time i made it to the next concession i could not see it any more. 

1) the lights where bright so it was hard to see the true shape.
2) i live 65 miles north of the toronto international airport. 
3) i live 35 mile west of the city of barrie
4) i live 15 miles west of canadian forces base borden.
content.summary: I saw an object heading north flying low, slow and no noise.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were vacationing in gulf shores, alabama, the week of september 13 through the 20th. on the evening of september 17, 2014, we had been fishing on the docks behind our condo unit. shortly after 9 p.M., i returned to the condo to prepare for bed. my family continued to fish. after showering, i walked onto the balcony, picked up the binoculars and scanned the sky. there had been a heavy cloud cover most of the day and was still present that night. the cloud cover was so thick i could observe no stars or planets. as i turned to my right, which would be a sw directions, i saw 3 finger tipped sized yellow lights in a triangular pattern with a large expanse between them. i cleaned the binocular lens to be sure i was not picking up reflection from dust or moisture. as i watched the objects hovering just below the dense dark clouds, it became obvious it had a huge dark dense mass and triangular form. it appeared to be hovering perhaps a half mile from my location with one light over highway 59 west, one over water but close to the beach shore area and one light probably 300 to 400 feet out into the gulf, but it was so dark with cloud coverage it was difficult to judge distance. it appeared to hover, but slowly pivoted to change to a more southern direction. i watched for about ten minutes and went inside to get a drink of water. when i returned to the balcony a minute or two later, it was gone. the distance between lights and the dark density of the mass made me think of the phoenix sighting several years ago. i have observed several ufo's over the years, but nothing this size before. i make an effort to eliminate other possibilities before stating an object is a ufo. i do not react with fear of them but just silently observe them when i have seen them. i will add that the object could not be seen at all with the naked eye but only with my binoculars, yet, no stars at all could be seen. i do not have video or photos of the sighting.
content.summary: Massive sized triangle over gulf shore, alabama

content.detailedDescription: It was 8:30 am i was on a plane the captain just announced we were at 10,000 feet getting ready for our decent into baltimore. i was looking out the window. i had a window seat. we were above the clouds which were at about 8,000 feet that day. as we were flying along all the sudden out my window ( there were witnesses on the plane) there were two towers sticking thru the top of the clouds about a mile away. the looked exactly like metal cell towers of some sort with flashing lights on top of them. one was extremely large and a smaller one about 500 yards from it and not as high also stuck up. we all watched it, it was stationary like we had just flown by  2 skyscraper antenna towers but as we descended under clouds less then 30 seconds later there were no buildings anywhere and i never heard of a structure being over 6,000 feet  high. we were over country area no cities at all. it is as if these towers were hidden in the clouds. i google every thing i could think of to see if there was some kind of structure that could be on a mountain that maybe we flew by. but came up short. if there hadn't been witnesses i would have questioned what i saw, but it was 2 solid metal towers sticking out of the top of the clouds. i didn't have my camera because it was under seat so couldn't get to it at time. i wanted to know if there is a way to find out if something was reported yesterday of same thing from any pilots or air traffic controllers.
content.summary: 2 towers that looked like cell towers

content.detailedDescription: I was in an old friends large open backyard just after midnight in gresham, or september 21st 2014. i had just shown my non believer friend a few videos i created on his tablet, one about orbs and the other starseeds. i had just shut the tablet off when i looked up behind him and suddenly out of no where appeared 3 glowing orange red ethereal craft, flying in a triangular formation,  they almost looked like the ghosts of 3 old fighter planes. they were about 1000 ft above us cruising fairly fast s.E. and completely silent. i said to my friend, "look look look" he says "i'm seeing it oh my god" the suddenly disappeared as if into another dimension.  five minutes later we saw them again this time not over us but in front of us flying east to west.  fifteen minutes later we saw them again this time for a good 10 seconds cruising across the sky. unfortunately we got no pictures or videos my phone was dead the first time and didn't expect to see more so soon! it was an incredible experience nonetheless. not my first time seeing ufos, but the first time i've seen anything like these. i've never even heard about these.
content.summary: Out of no where appeared 3 glowing orange red ethereal craft, flying in a triangular formation, they were about 1000 ft above us cruising fairly fast s.E. and completely silent

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside and noticed strange red orbflitting in sky. add we watched, it changed direction several times and then quickly descended.We'd initially believed it could have been a drone if some type, but it was very bright and very fast. we had an eerie feeling it was far more utan a drone. our two dogs immediately paused and watched the sky, which is unusual. ultimately, it descended and we lost sight of it due to housing skyline. it appears to have landed, but we can't confirm.
content.summary: Red orb over queen creek, az

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife where on our patio july 3rd about 3:15 pm.
we saw a craft hovering in sky about 500 ft up and a mile or two away above the treeline and powerlines. 
it release smaller round objects that disapeared going downward in a southeast  direction. 
and then we watched the round objects return to craft and reenter it on the west side of the craft 5 to 10 minets later
content.summary: Saw craft hovering in sky and release smaller  round objects and watch round object return to craft 5 to 10 minets later

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright ball of light with a tail of light in my backyard.  i had let my dogs out and i looked up.  it seemed to come out of nowhere. it was solid white going in a straight line across the sky.  we had some low clouds and it was above them.  as it went from the south to the west, it went above a cloud and never came out. it was such a bright light that you couldn't help but notice it.  it took only seconds to go across the sky.  it was not a shooting star because it was too close and it went in a horizontal straight line.  we had rain earlier in the day but 2:30 in the morning there were only a few clouds.  they were low and sparse.  the object headed for a cloud and i never saw it come out.  it was traveling at a fast rate.

when i saw it, i started ruling out fallen stars, they are usually faint and they go in a vertical arc drop.  i have seen sattelites fall and they go straight down.  the ball of light was bright, solid, about the size of a grapefruit but what i found strange was there was a solid white tail that did not leave a trail.  it was a ball of light about six inches round and a tail on the left side about six inches long that tapered on the ends.  i kept waiting for the object to leave the cloud because it was going much faster than the cloud but it never came out.

it was the intensity of the light that caught my eye.  there was no noise.

when i saw it i thought to make mental notes of any detail i might see.  it happened so fast that it was over.  i called my dogs in.  i remember about 5 minutes after getting in the house i heard helicopters.  i have been hearing helicopters every night so far.
content.summary: Bright ball of light coming from the south to the west

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba en merída, venezuela en el parque chorros de milla, había nevado y el tiempo al estar despejado decidí tomar varias fotos del pico bolívar cubierto de nieve, al momento de iniciar las tomas visualice un objeto a gran velocidad descendiendo a 180º para luego cambiar a 275º y permanecer estaticamente por un breve periodo (momento de la mejor foto, tengo 2 fotos adicionales donde se visualiza<a el descenso 180º y la estabilización 275º, en caso de requerirla la puedo suministrar sin problema. el objeto me pareció una nave muy diferente a las conocidas por mi hasta ahora, era un objeto obscuro rodeado por una luz blanca parecido a una aureola, con movimientos muy diferentes a los conocidos por mi, mis sentimientos fue de emoción ya que es la segunda vez que capto un ovni /la primera vez fue en cuzco, perú, tengo la foto en caso de requerirla), al buscar otros testigos perdí de vista al objeto.
content.summary: Objedto en forma discoidal, obscuros con un haz de luz blanca alrededor del mismo.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a wedding ceremony in massapequa,ny. i noticed two round objects when viewing this pic sent from my friend's i-phone. you can see a small round object next to the cloud on the right ( need to expand pic to see)and another bigger round object on the upper right hand corner of the pic. not sure what it is...
content.summary: Noticed two round objects in the top right hand side of pic.One small object by the cloud located on the right side and a bigger object on right top corner .

content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba en merída, venezuela, parque chorros de millas, tome foto al pico bolívar por la nevada ocurrida durante el día 18/09/14 y al percatarme visualice una objeto descendiendo a 180º y a gran velocidad el cual cambio rumbo a 275º fue captado en 3 fotos, luego me percate que se encontraba estacionario tomando la  mejor foto de una imagen bastante grande (por la distancia donde me encontraba al momento de la toma de la foto) de algo que parecía ser un ovni, al buscar otros testigos la misma había desaparecido, los movimientos de la nave son muy diferentes a los conocidos hasta ahora por mi persona, mis sentimientos fue de mucha emoción ya que es la 2da vez que capto un ovni (objeto volador no identificado, deseo aclarar que no estoy asegurando la existencia de seres grises, verdes o marcianos, simplemente un objeto que desconozco su origen y/o intención). el objeto lo perdí de vista al buscar los testigos. 
observación: tengo 2 fotos mas en caso de requerirla, descenso y  cambio de rumbo antes de permanecer estacionario.
content.summary: Foto tomada desde la ciudad de merida al pico bolívar con telf celular mini s4

content.detailedDescription: I was in my dining room facing south, closing the windows for the night at about 10 pm last night. i looked up over the roof top of the neighboring house, and noticed 3 orange lights, in a horizontal line, in the sky about 2-3 feet above the roof-line. they were approximately the size of a round pencil eraser and the brightness of the lights was constant orange with no flashing such as from a helicopter or plane. at first i thought they might be helicopters as they were not moving nor changing shape. we live two blocks from a hospital where there is a helipad; we see them come and go regularly. as i watched them to see if they were moving, another appeared - exactly the same size (not fading in from a smaller size as though coming closer), then 3 more appeared. they were not in any discernible pattern though the first 3 were still in a horizontal line. there was some movement among them, like arranging themselves equidistant, then hovering in place. i rushed out onto the front porch to see if i could hear the sound of rotors, or engines. it seemed unlikely there were that many helicopters hovering so close together - they appeared to be about an inch or so apart, and i could not tell how far away. outside i could not hear any sound at all. i was feeling alarmed now, as this was very strange. i looked around to see if there was anyone else out for a walk or in their yard to point it out to, but saw no one. about a minute after i went outside, one of the lights faded away - it didn't get smaller as though moving away from me, the light simply dimmed, then vanished. the remaining 6 did the same thing - simply faded away one after another. i counted and it was approximately 3 seconds from the time they began to dim until they completely disappeared.
content.summary: 3 then 7 orange light hovering, then faded

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i'm submitting this for my brother,he has an ip camera set up in his garage, it sends him an email and records when something triggers it, basically all you see is his car and some junk, all of a sudden there's 4 transparent discs one on top of the other, just moving from right to left, when my brother showed me the footage i had to share it, i find it amazing, definitely something there..
content.summary: Something set off the surveillance system in my brothers garage, amazing

content.detailedDescription:
About 4:31 am on september 20, 2014 driving along hwy 11 from keowee, the driver of the vehicle spotted an object floating in the sky.

this isn't the first time we have seen an object. we have reported a couple of sightings before.

at first, the object appeared to look like a reflection of the red interior lights inside the vehicle. it was until this object moved that we realized that it wasn't the interior lights. we all became a little nervous.

we decided to follow the object the best we could.

the object appeared to be black, though actual color could not be identified due to how far away the object was. it appeared to be spherical with a red glow at the bottom of the object. 

the object was slightly to the right of the vehicle above the treeline. it stayed like this for a short period until it moved left into the center of the road, and then begin to descend. after a short distance, it ascended, moved slightly left, then back right to it's original position above the treeline.

we were close to wildcat falls when the red light glowed brighter and then a sound as if a saw was slicing down the side of the vehicle occurred, which startled us, and then the object went to the right and the light faded as if it had landed beyond the treeline. 

we stopped and turned around to see if we could debunk this object, but we could not.

we are amateur paranormal investigators who occasionally enjoy ufo hunting.
content.summary: Object witnessed while driving down road.

content.detailedDescription: This observation took place from our cottage on the east shore of moosehead lake in north central maine.  it is a wilderness setting.  the seeing was excellent with no moon and no clouds near the observed path.  my wife awakened me to show me the object.  she had noticed it through our bedroom window when she got up to go to the bathroom.  this is not the first time we have seen objects of this general description.  the direction of the initial siting was essentially due north at an elevation of approximately 45 degrees. it was moving in a westerly direction at a high velocity.  my initial impression based on a naked eye observation was of a circular light, subtending an angle of approximately 1/4 the diameter of the moon.  a strobe effect was occurring from the center of the object with a frequency of about once per second.  after a few seconds the object passed behind some trees and was out of view for a few more seconds.  we then went to another window, one facing the lake, hoping to catch sight of the object as it emerged from behind the trees.  it did indeed reappear and continued moving until it reached a point that was almost due west of our position with an elevation of about 30 degrees.  the object appeared to stop at that point.  from our cottage, this would be looking out in the direction of sugar island and the main body of moosehead lake.  the object appeared smaller, less bright but was continuing to strobe.  at this point, i grabbed some binoculars and had a good look.  through the binoculars i was able to see three, thin, collinear, horizontally oriented lights that were yellow-orange in color.  centered on this configuration was the intense, white light strobing every second or so. during the time that the object was holding the same direction, there was no apparent change in size through the binoculars.  after a minute or two, the object began moving again and within a few seconds passed over the horizon in a southwesterly direction.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object observed crossing the sky; initially larger and brighter; bright light with central strobe effect.

content.detailedDescription: Was headed back to the lake on a country road, just looked up and there it was. just above the tree tops. it looked like car headlights, in the air. floated there the just vanished. no sound at all, wasn't an airplane of copter. this was the lake of the ozarks area. i watched it for around 10 minutes, then it was just gone. the set of lights were side by side
content.summary: 2 sets of headlight,side by side, they floated that way for 10 mints then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on mcmenemy street about 1/3 mile from my home i saw a orange lite in the sky about my 11 o clock moving north not a normal color than the usual aircraft .Living just north of st. paul for 49 years with the airport and national guard 5 miles south i'm familiar with different aircraft lights , this caught my eye as a color i've never seen.There was a strobing to it it was moving north  so i stopped in front of my driveway the object then stopped i turned. into my driveway,jumped out and the object began moving again slowly i turned my vehicle off to listen there was no noise  and the object stopped again now it was not strobing it began to move again directly above me to the north behind a small cloud and never came out i waited another 5 minutes scanning the sky ,it was gone. all aircraft always have landing liters this close to the airport the sky was mostly clear with a few few strafing small clouds temp was 55 wind at 3.5 miles an hour no ceiling 10 mile visibility
content.summary: Observed strange color lite not normal than i regularly see

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on gilbert rd, in mesa. around 7:50pm, saw 4 lights, 1 appearing at a time and flickering on/off. at one point they were all "on", looked like they were spiraling downwards, like a firework dud, but they would "turn off" and reappear eventually. they were are all falling, maybe following each other. not planes. between the time i first saw the lights while driving, i stopped by my parents and told them. went outside and they were gone and didn't see them again (about 3 minutes). they seemed like fireworks that had gone up and kind of floated coming down but not exploding.
content.summary: Sprialing lights downward in gilbert/chandler

content.detailedDescription:
On 9/20/14 at approximately 7:20pm my husband, 2 kids and myself were driving back from casa grande, az and my husband and i saw the following:

we were driving north on gilbert rd. just past ocitillo rd. in chandler, az when i saw two red/orange balls in the northeast sky quite a distance from us. they were sitting at a diagonal from each other but too close together to be airplanes. i pointed them out to my husband who commented that they may be an antenna tower.  i commented that it must be one crocked antenna because of the diagonal line they made instead of vertical. 

i dismissed them until 20 minutes later when we were on the 202 e just before the val vista rd. exit. i looked up at them and they were white now and, to my eye, looked to be about the size of the old large satellite dishes until they broke up into four separate balls about the size of basketballs.  i guesstimated them to be around 3-4 miles northeast from us and approximately 500 feet from the ground. 

we pulled off to the side of the highway and watched them as they seemed to be floating down from the sky in a diamond shaped pattern.  as they were doing this each ball of light intermittently changed in brightness going between glowing bright with red flaming tails (like a comet) to dim white balls of light to barely visible.  they floated down slowly like a feather.  each time one flared up the others did not. also as they were coming down individually they were slowly changing direction in circular motions. 

they eventually fell out of our line of sight behind buildings. they were moving to slowly with weird directional changes to be a meteor or something else falling from the sky.
content.summary: Two balls of light that separated into four as the slowly descended with directional change and intermittent flaming tails while descending
